summary: March 1917. World War I is already three years in. A sealed train with Russian emigrants keeps on driving from Germany and Sweden to St. Petersburg. The outlaws stand under the guidance of ... See full summary »
cast: Ben Kingsley|Leslie Caron|Dominique Sanda|Jason Connery|Timothy West|Paolo Bonacelli|Günther Maria Halmer|Robin McCallum|Peter Whitman|Xabier Elorriaga|Dagmar Schwarz|Jeannine Mestre|Mattia Sbragia|Hans-Michael Rehberg|Georges Boukoff|Franz Gary|Ernst Jacobi|Amadeus August|Manfred Andrae|Tobias Engel|Wolfgang Gasser|Thomas Heinze|Claus Homschak|Hans Kraemmer|Peter Kuiper|Georg Marischka|Verena Mayr|Werner Prinz|Henning Schlüter|Brook Williams|Christoph Zadra|Michael Aichhorn|Alan Goodson|Helmut Janatsch|Erwin Leder|Martin Peter|Hermann Schmid|Ulrich Wesselmann|Guido Wieland
title: El tren de Lenin
